item.title: St. Patrick's Day Celebration
item.description:
Event date: March 17, 2015
Event Time: 02:00 PM - 09:00 PM
Location:
836 Reynolds Street
Augusta, GA 30901
Description:
Augusta Common will be “rolling out the Green Carpet” on the St. Patrick’s Day. Come join us in the Augusta Common for live entertainment, children’s play area, and lots of food, merchandise, and drink vendors. Vendors Welcome. For more information, please call 706-821-1754.
